legend_0025_hakase_02a:
I detect that [pknm:1] has regained some
of its original power.[npcn:B]
legend_0025_hakase_02b:
I detect that [pknm:1] has regained some
of its original power.[npcn:E]
legend_0025_hakase_03a:
It seems it will now be able to [clr:6]dash[clr:0] at high
speeds while you’re riding upon it.[npcn:B]
legend_0025_hakase_03b:
It seems it will now be able to [clr:6]dash[clr:0] at high
speeds while you’re riding upon it.[npcn:E]
legend_0025_hakase_04a:
While you’re riding upon it, it seems it can now
[clr:6]jump[clr:0] higher if you press and hold the B Button.[npcn:B]
legend_0025_hakase_04b:
While you’re riding upon it, it seems it can now
[clr:6]jump[clr:0] higher if you press and hold the B Button.[npcn:E]
legend_0025_hakase_05a:
After it has jumped into the air, you should try
pressing the B Button again. It should [clr:6]glide[clr:0] now.[npcn:B]
legend_0025_hakase_05b:
After it has jumped into the air, you should try
pressing the B Button again. It should [clr:6]glide[clr:0] now.[npcn:E]
legend_0025_hakase_06a:
While riding upon it, it seems you should now be
able to [clr:6]move across water[clr:0].[npcn:B]
legend_0025_hakase_06b:
While riding upon it, it seems you should now be
able to [clr:6]move across water[clr:0].[npcn:E]
legend_0025_hakase_07a:
It should now be able to [clr:6]climb up[clr:0] any vertical
surfaces it grabs on to while you’re riding upon it.[npcn:B]
legend_0025_hakase_07b:
It should now be able to [clr:6]climb up[clr:0] any vertical
surfaces it grabs on to while you’re riding upon it.[npcn:E]
legend_0025_hakase_08a:
I hope you will continue to explore Paldea with
[pknm:1], as you have done here.\c
Your route is not fixed but open before you.\c
Seek out your own path, using your map and the
tools you have at hand.\c
Whenever you find your curiosity piqued, you
should go and explore as your heart desires.\c
All that you experience will help you grow in
some way, great or small.[npcn:B]
legend_0025_hakase_08b:
I hope you will continue to explore Paldea with

Your route is not fixed but open before you.\c

Whenever you find your curiosity piqued, you

All that you experience will help you grow in

legend_0025_hakase_09a:
Go forth on your journey...and take good care of
[pknm:1] for me.[npcn:B]
legend_0025_hakase_09b:
